title: Carrey’s girlfriend’s last words
text:
Email a friend 
A SOMBRE Jim Carrey flew to Ireland to be a pallbearer at ex-girlfriend Cathriona White’s funeral on Saturday morning. 
The visibly heartbroken Hollywood actor helped bear the coffin along with five other men — including White’s brother, James — from the service to the burial grounds. 
Dressed in a black suit and tie, the bearded Carrey wrapped his arms around White’s sister outside Our Lady of Fatima Church in the tiny village of Cappawhite in County Tiperrary, mingling with the crowd of family and friends at the memorial service. 
White and Carrey had reportedly broken up five days before the 30-year-old makeup artist overdosed on pills and died in Los Angeles on September 28. The pair had dated on and off since 2012. 
She left behind a suicide note professing her love for the comic, Radar Online reported. 
“Jim, I love you,” White wrote. “Please forgive me. I’m not for this world.” 
She was laid to rest in Cappawhite Cemetery beside her late father, Pat, who died in 2012 after a long battle with brain cancer. Carrey and White reportedly rekindled their relationship in May this year. Source: Supplied 
The 52-year-old actor returned to Twitter for the first time in almost a month on Saturday, just hours after laying to rest his ex-girlfriend. 
“Love cannot be lost,” he wrote alongside a shadow silhouette of himself with White and a red rose emoji. Love cannot be lost.  pic.twitter.com/XxPYOhkdzc — Jim Carrey (@JimCarrey) October 10, 2015 
Following the news of White’s death, her family released a statement to the Irish Independent , celebrating her life: “The family of Cathriona White sincerely regret the untimely passing of their beloved daughter and sister,” they said. 
“Cathriona was a shining light in our lives who was loved deeply by her entire family. We will miss her terribly and at this difficult time we ask to be left in private to mourn our loss.” 
Carrey paid for White’s funeral services, sources told Radar Online. 
If you or someone you know needs help, please contact Lifeline on 13 11 14, or visit Beyond Blue’s website. Jim Carrey joins mourners behind the coffin of ex-girlfriend Cathriona White in her home village of Cappawhite, Ireland, on Saturday Oct. 10, 2015. Source: AP
